City Council Meetings are held on the 1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month at 7:00 P.M. Meetings are held at the following location:

Glenn Heights City Hall
City Council Chambers
1938-C S Hampton Road
Glenn Heights, TX 75154

Agendas are posted on the website and at City Hall at least 72 hours prior to the meeting. Minutes are posted on the website following approval.

About the City Council
----------------------

The governing and lawmaking body of the City of Glenn Heights shall consist of a Mayor and 6 Council Members, and said body shall be known as the City Council of the City of Glenn Heights. The members of the City Council shall be the only elective officers of the City and shall run for office by place and be elected from the City at large for a term of 3 years, or until their successors are duly elected and qualified.

City of Glenn Heights Mission Statement & Vision Statement
----------------------------------------------------------

On August 9, 2022, City Council adopted the City's Official Mission and Vision Statements, and the City Of Glenn Heights 2022-2023 Strategic Goals and Objectives.

The City of Glenn Heights is a safe, inclusive, and welcoming community that celebrates our small-town charm with urban amenities, where families can live, work, and play.

To view the City's
2022-2023 Strategic Goals and Objectives, please use the following link:
[City of Glenn Heights - A Vision for Our Future](https://www.glennheightstx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/2852/City-of-Glenn-Heights---A-Vision-for-Our-Future)

Glenn Heights is a home rule city with a Council-Manager type government and is governed by the
[City of Glenn Heights Home Rule Charter (PDF)](https://www.glennheightstx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/280/Home-Rule-Charter-PDF)
. This Charter is dedicated to the citizens of the City of Glenn Heights, Texas and to ensure such powers, rights, and duties as are herein provided and to encourage the citizens' participation in the democratic government for proper and efficient progress of our city. To this end we ordain this home rule charter as prescribed by law and with the guidance of God.
